name.baseName: Zinc oxide (hypo zinc oxide) ; Zinc baking sand, zinc soot and other zinc-containing materials ; Smoking furnace process ; All sizes; NESPS2
氧化锌（次氧化锌） ; 锌焙砂、锌烟尘等含锌物料 ; 烟化炉窑工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisRedox process + chemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management36

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisRedox process + chemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management36
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表了使用末端处理技术管理工业废水污染物的多种工艺。主要应用领域为锌氧化物生产设施，处理如锌焙砂和锌烟尘等含锌材料。治理方法专注于降低废水中的化学需氧量（COD）、氨氮、总磷、有机结合氮、铅、砷、镉和汞等污染物，确保满足环境标准。铅、砷、镉和汞去除最有效的处理方法包括中和、氧化还原过程、化学沉淀和膜分离的组合。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码3212文件，在完整版文件中第4878页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution MercuryisNeutralization + redox process + chemical precipitation + membrane separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.5
污染物指标汞的末端治理技术是中和法+氧化还原法+化学沉淀法+膜分离法，其效率为99.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=废水处理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/企业正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为汞，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为汞
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution MercuryisNeutralization + redox process + chemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99

污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是中和法+氧化还原法+化学沉淀法+膜分离法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=废水处理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/企业正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
